issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

iPod 4th gen (4.1), 3rd gen 4.0.2 with mobile sdk build 1.5.0.62c1cae

1.Phone>play Movie>local movie
2.use the scrub bar and scrub more than half way
3.tap the back button

esults: crash

Mon Oct 18 10:12:45 eWorld ReportCrash[6100] : Formulating crash report for process KitchenSink[6095]

Mon Oct 18 10:12:45 eWorld com.apple.launchd1 : (UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.KitchenSink[0x2f46]) Job appears to have crashed: Bus error

Mon Oct 18 10:12:45 eWorld SpringBoard[26] : Application 'KitchenSink' exited abnormally with signal 10: Bus error

Mon Oct 18 10:12:45 eWorld ReportCrash[6100] : Saved crashreport to /var/mobile/Library/Logs/CrashReporter/KitchenSink_2010-10-18-101244_eWorld.plist using uid: 0 gid: 0, synthetic_euid: 501 egid: 0

{html}
fields.summary: iOS, local video - crash on close after scrubbing

comments.body:
{html}

(from [673ba4c5a2eb5980e0907fc4435c734140d91428]) [#2109 state:fixed-in-qa] Events cannot be fired on the background when they may need to be processed during context close. This could result in views, or other important information to the event, being deallocated. http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/673ba4c5a2eb5...

{html}
